title: Cannot open Firefox with version 87.0
content:
After installing Firefox Version 87.0 today, I haven't been able to open the application. Each time I try I get the following error message, "Windows cannot access the specified device, path, or file. You may not have the appropriate permissions to access the item." I have tried both running the installer again to fix it and downloading a new copy of the installer and running it, neither of which solved the issue.

I found a previous thread from 2018 detailing the same issue (wherein the chosen solution was to make sure that your firewall wasn't blocking firefox's access to the internet) however;

A) I can't even start the firefox application, let alone see if it can access the internet. B) I tried making my antivirus application ignore it (Malwarebytes), but when I tried to do so it said I didn't have permissions to access the file.

To be clear mine is the ONLY account on the computer, and is the admin account as a result. My pc is running on Windows 7 64 bit in case that is relevant (though I didn't see anything in the update notes to suggest that they're ending support for Windows 7 just yet).
creator: kaelhound

title: "allow calibre to use IndexedDB storage in your browser"
content: Hello, How do I permit Calibre to use IndexedDB storage in Firefox? I am running Firefox 87.0 on Windows 10. Both are fully updated as of the time of this writing (26 March 2021). In Calibre 5.13.0, I enable "Sharing over the net," then I "Start server," and then I "Test server." Calibre opens a tab in Firefox but returns the following error message: "Error: Could not initialize database You must allow calibre to use IndexedDB storage in your browser to read books" I cannot figure out how to enable IndexedDB storage for Firefox. Thank you in advance for your help, Eric
creator: eric.hainz

title: Malware Threat on Opening Pages of a Website
content: Hi I am working on this footwear website. Some of its pages including the homepage is giving malware threat on entering in the url on google. I want to ask is my site hacked or there is some other problem?
creator: ahsan8524679
